name: df-dilN
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3
body: |- wceq(cdilN, cmpt(s0, universe, cmpt(s1, cfv(catm, cv(s0)), crab(s2, cfv(cpautN, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cfv(cpsubsp, cv(s0)), wi(wss(cv(s3), cfv(cfv(cwpointsN, cv(s0)), cv(s1))), wceq(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cv(s3))))))))
bodyPretty: ‚ä¢ Dil =(s0 ‚àà ùïå ‚Ü¶(s1 ‚àà(Atoms ` s0)‚Ü¶ { s2 ‚àà(PAut ` s0)| ‚àÄ(s3 ‚àà(PSubSp ` s0),(s3 ‚äÜ((WAtoms ` s0)` s1)‚Üí(s2 ` s3)= s3))}))
comment: Define set of all dilations. Definition of dilation in [Crawley] p. 111. (Contributed by NM, 30-Jan-2012.)
